snippet.title: Mists of Aiden — Official Trailer (Old Version)
snippet.description:
Mists of Aiden is a first-person story driven horror game. You play as a thief trapped in an eerie mansion. Each choice can open a new mystery of the house and lead to a unique walkthrough and ending. Uncover final secret of the house. Uncover your own secrets.

If you are interested in out game, add it to your Steam wishlist:
Steam — https://store.steampowered.com/app/1239050/Mists_of_Aiden/
VK - https://vk.com/steppe_hare 
We are supporting youtubers, streamers and other media. If you want to make content about our game, please send us letter with an attached link to your YouTube channel or other source on steppeharestudio@gmail.com.
Keymailer: https://www.keymailer.co/g/games/99198

Music: 
"I will always find you" by Giovanni Puocci (CC BY)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nPSB3oTAin0
